targets.rawSql:
USE [LogRhythm_LogMart];
SELECT
  [Avg MPS] = CAST(SUM(CAST(CountProcessedLogs as BIGINT)) AS real) / CAST(DATEDIFF(ss,$__timeFrom(),$__timeTo()) as BIGINT),
	[Max MPS] = CAST(MAX(CountProcessedLogs) AS float) / 60.0
FROM
	[dbo].StatsDeploymentCountsMinute with (NOLOCK)
WHERE  $__timeFilter(StatDate);

SELECT
  COUNT(*) as Count
FROM
  LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.MsgSource with (NOLOCK)
WHERE
  RecordStatus = 1 AND Name NOT LIKE 'AI Engine%'

SELECT
	count(*) as Count
FROM
  	LogRhythm_Alarms.dbo.Alarm a with (NOLOCK)
  	  JOIN
	  LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.AlarmRule ar
	    ON a.AlarmRuleID = ar.AlarmRuleID
WHERE
  ar.AlarmType = 5
    AND
  $__timeFilter(DateInserted)

SELECT
 count(*) as Count
FROM
  	[LogRhythm_CMDB].[dbo].[Case] with (NOLOCK)
WHERE
  $__timeFilter([DateCreated])

SELECT [Owner], [Case Collaborators],  (SELECT DATEDIFF_BIG (ss, CAST([Date Earliest Evidence] as datetime), CAST([Date Created]as datetime))) TTD,  (SELECT DATEDIFF_BIG(ss, CAST([Date Incident] as datetime), CAST([Date Mitigated] as datetime))) TTR,  (SELECT DATEDIFF(minute, CAST([Date Earliest Evidence] as datetime),CAST([Date Created] as datetime))) TTQ,  (SELECT DATEDIFF(minute, CAST([Date Created] as datetime),CAST([Date Incident] as datetime))) TTI,  (SELECT DATEDIFF(minute, CAST([Date Incident] as datetime),CAST([Date Mitigated] as datetime))) TTM,  (SELECT DATEDIFF(minute, CAST([Date Created] as datetime),CAST([Date Mitigated] as datetime))) TTV FROM [LogRhythm_CMDB].[dbo].[vw_Cases]
WHERE $__timeFilter([Date Created])

SELECT
  cs.Name as [Case Status],
  (CASE cs.IsClosedStatus when 1 then 'Closed' ELSE 'Open' END) as [Open_Closed],
  COUNT(*) as Count
 FROM 
	LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case] c with (NOLOCK) 
	  join 
  LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.CaseStatus cs
		ON c.CaseStatusID = cs.CaseStatusID
WHERE  $__timeFilter(c.DateCreated)
GROUP BY
  cs.Name,
  cs.IsClosedStatus
ORDER BY
  [Open_Closed] ASC

SELECT
  [Priority],
  AVG(DATEDIFF(MiNute,[DateEarliestEvidence],[DateCreated])) avgTTD,
	AVG(DATEDIFF(MiNute,[DateCreated],[DateClosed])) avgTTR,
  COUNT(*) as Count
 FROM 
	LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case] with (NOLOCK)
WHERE  $__timeFilter([DateCreated])
GROUP BY
  [Priority]
ORDER BY
  [Priority] ASC

SELECT
  [Priority],
  AVG(DATEDIFF(MiNute,alm.[GeneratedOn],alm.[OpenedOn])) avgTTT,
  AVG(DATEDIFF(MiNute,alm.[GeneratedOn],c.[DateCreated])) avgTTQ,
  AVG(DATEDIFF(minute,c.[DateCreated],c.[DateIncident])) avgTTI,
  AVG(DATEDIFF(minute,c.[DateIncident],c.[DateMitigated])) avgTTM,
  AVG(DATEDIFF(MiNute,c.[DateMitigated],c.[DateClosed])) avgTTV,
  AVG(DATEDIFF(MiNute,c.[DateEarliestEvidence],c.[DateCreated])) avgTTD,
	AVG(DATEDIFF(minute,c.[DateCreated],c.[DateMitigated])) avgTTR,
  COUNT(*) as Count
 FROM 
	LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.[Case] c with (NOLOCK)
	JOIN
  (SELECT atc.CaseID,am.GeneratedOn,am.OpenedOn,am.InvestigatedOn,am.ClosedOn FROM [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[AlarmToCase] atc JOIN [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[AlarmMetrics] am ON atc.AlarmID = am.AlarmID) alm
    ON c.[CaseID] = alm.[CaseID]
WHERE  $__timeFilter([DateCreated])
GROUP BY
  [Priority]
ORDER BY
  [Priority] ASC

SELECT [Owner], [Case Collaborators],  (SELECT DATEDIFF_BIG (ss, CAST([Date Earliest Evidence] as datetime), CAST([Date Created]as datetime))) TTD,  (SELECT DATEDIFF_BIG(ss, CAST([Date Incident] as datetime), CAST([Date Mitigated] as datetime))) TTR,  (SELECT DATEDIFF(minute, CAST([Date Earliest Evidence] as datetime),CAST([Date Created] as datetime))) TTQ,  (SELECT DATEDIFF(minute, CAST([Date Created] as datetime),CAST([Date Incident] as datetime))) TTI,  (SELECT DATEDIFF(minute, CAST([Date Incident] as datetime),CAST([Date Mitigated] as datetime))) TTM,  (SELECT DATEDIFF(minute, CAST([Date Created] as datetime),CAST([Date Mitigated] as datetime))) TTV FROM [LogRhythm_CMDB].[dbo].[vw_Cases]
WHERE $__timeFilter([Date Created])

select FullName,(Convert(nvarchar, Case
When AlarmStatus = 0 Then 'New'
When AlarmStatus = 1 Then 'OpenAlarm'
When AlarmStatus = 2 Then 'Working'
When AlarmStatus = 3 Then 'Escalated'
When AlarmStatus = 4 Then 'AutoClosed'
When AlarmStatus = 5 Then 'FalsePositive'
When AlarmStatus = 6 Then 'Resolved'
When AlarmStatus = 7 Then 'UnResolved'
When AlarmStatus = 8 Then 'Reported'
When AlarmStatus = 9 Then 'Monitor' End)) as AlarmStatus
, count(AlarmStatus) as 'Count'
from AlarmMetrics
join [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[Alarm] on Alarm.AlarmID=AlarmMetrics.AlarmID
join LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.AlarmRule on Alarm.AlarmRuleID=AlarmRule.AlarmRuleID
left join [LogRhythmEMDB].[dbo].[Person] on Person.PersonID=LastPersonID
where $__timeFilter(Alarm.AlarmDate)
group by FullName,AlarmStatus

select Name, (ISNULL(New,0)+ISNULL(OpenAlarm,0)+ISNULL(Working,0)+ISNULL(Escalated,0)+ISNULL(AutoClosed,0)+ISNULL(FalsePositive,0)+ISNULL(Resolved,0)+ISNULL(UnResolved,0)+ISNULL(Reported,0)+ISNULL(Monitor,0)) as Total,
ISNULL(New,0) as New,
ISNULL(OpenAlarm,0) as 'Open',
ISNULL(Working,0) as Working,
ISNULL(Escalated,0) as Escalated,
ISNULL(AutoClosed, 0 )as 'Auto Closed',
ISNULL(FalsePositive,0) as 'False Positive',
ISNULL(Resolved,0) as Resolved,
ISNULL(UnResolved,0) as UnResolved,
ISNULL(Reported,0) as Reported,
ISNULL(Monitor,0) as Monitor
from
(
select AlarmName.Name,count(AlarmName.Name) as AlarmCount,
(Convert(nvarchar, Case
When AlarmStatus = 0 Then 'New'
When AlarmStatus = 1 Then 'OpenAlarm'
When AlarmStatus = 2 Then 'Working'
When AlarmStatus = 3 Then 'Escalated'
When AlarmStatus = 4 Then 'AutoClosed'
When AlarmStatus = 5 Then 'FalsePositive'
When AlarmStatus = 6 Then 'Resolved'
When AlarmStatus = 7 Then 'UnResolved'
When AlarmStatus = 8 Then 'Reported'
When AlarmStatus = 9 Then 'Monitor' End)) as AlarmStatus
from [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[Alarm] as Alarm join LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.AlarmRule as AlarmName on Alarm.AlarmRuleID=AlarmName.AlarmRuleID
where $__timeFilter(Alarm.AlarmDate)
group by AlarmName.Name,AlarmStatus
) d
pivot
(
max(AlarmCount)
for AlarmStatus in (New,OpenAlarm,Working,Escalated,AutoClosed,FalsePositive,Resolved,UnResolved,Reported,Monitor)
) piv
